import{GraphQLError}from'./GraphQLError';/**
 * Given an arbitrary Error, presumably thrown while attempting to execute a
 * GraphQL operation, produce a new GraphQLError aware of the location in the
 * document responsible for the original Error.
 */export function locatedError(originalError,nodes,path){// Note: this uses a brand-check to support GraphQL errors originating from
// other contexts.
if(originalError&&Array.isArray(originalError.path)){return originalError;}return new GraphQLError(originalError&&originalError.message,originalError&&originalError.nodes||nodes,originalError&&originalError.source,originalError&&originalError.positions,path,originalError);}
